rooms.description: Spacious room adjacent to the central courtyard; designed for social gatherings and family time. Vastu-compliant with a southeast-facing entrance.
Traditional Kerala kitchen incorporating an open-plan layout, located on the east side of the floor plan for enhanced energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room, promoting a harmonious flow and communal space with proper ventilation as per local norms.
Dedicated office space located in the northwest corner for clarity of mind, aligning with Vastu guidelines to promote professional success.
Primary bedroom with ample window exposure and north-facing design ensuring peaceful energy as per Vastu principles.
Guest room designed for occasional use, strategically placed to maintain privacy while integrating into the overall layout.
